name: generatedata
description: Free, MIT-licensed tool for generating random test data. Have at it.
author: Ben Keen <ben.keen@gmail.com>

scripts.initApp: build config, create database, output some sort of message summarizing what just happened + handle re-runs gracefully
scripts.startApp: npm run prod && COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=150 docker-compose -f docker-compose-prod.yml up --build
scripts.dockerCleanup: docker system prune -a && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true)
